special_text:
Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.
[i](Activate each submodule once as a sorcery. When this enters, activate one submodule for free.)[/i]
{G}{G}{G}: Seed
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
{G}{G}{G}: Soil
Destroy target noncreature permanent.
{G}{G}{G}: Stem
Root Module gains “You may play an additional land on each of your turns.” and “Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.”
notes: !inpend Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.\\n/replace/
